mean_cn: v. 投资
sentence: I had a lot of money in the bank, so I decided to invest in a house.
sentence_tra: 我在银行里有一大笔钱，所以我决定要投资房产。

mean_cn: v.犹豫，踌躇；含糊，支吾
sentence: I hesitated by the signpost, wondering which way to go.
sentence_tra: 我在这个路标前犹豫不决，想知道到底该走哪条路。

mean_cn: n. 男人; 家伙
sentence: He is a tough guy.
sentence_tra: 他是一个硬汉。

mean_cn: v.使受伤；使痛心
sentence: The pretty girl hurt her leg while running.
sentence_tra: 这个美女跑步的时候伤到了她的腿。

mean_cn: v. 购买；努力取得n. 购买
sentence: I would like to purchase this shirt, please.
sentence_tra: 我要买这件衣服，谢谢。

mean_cn: v.说服，劝说；(of)使相信
sentence: The salesman persuaded us to buy a car.
sentence_tra: 这个销售员在说服我们俩买辆车。

mean_cn: n.收款台；结账
sentence: You can pay for your items at the checkout counter.
sentence_tra: 你可以在收款台那里付钱。

mean_cn: 另一方面；反过来说
sentence: I could go left. On the other hand, I could also go right.
sentence_tra: 我可以走左边，另一方面，我也可以走右边。

mean_cn: n. 恃强欺弱者 v. 威吓，欺负
sentence: The school bully is always giving other kids a hard time.
sentence_tra: 学校里的恃强欺弱者总是让其他小孩不好过。

mean_cn: n. 懊悔;  vt. 懊悔, 后悔;  抱歉;
sentence: I really regret not finishing school.
sentence_tra: 我好后悔没有完成学业。

mean_cn: n. 逗弄;  爱戏弄别人者;  vi. 戏弄;  vt. 取笑;  挑逗;  强求;
sentence: All the kids at school teased him for being different.
sentence_tra: 在学校有的孩子都因为他的与众不同而取笑他。

mean_cn: n.例子；箱子；情况v. 包围；把…装于容器中
sentence: As a lawyer, I have lots of cases to deal with.
sentence_tra: 作为一个律师，我有大量的案件需要处理。

mean_cn: n.错误，过失
sentence: If you make an error, you can just erase it and try again.
sentence_tra: 如果你写错了，擦掉重写一遍就好了。

sentence: At school we have to queue to get lunch.
sentence_tra: 在学校我们得排队打饭。

mean_cn: n. 运输; 运输工具;  vt. 运输; 输送; 使狂喜; 流放;
sentence: The goose is transporting a duck to cross over the river.
sentence_tra: 这只鹅正驮着一只鸭子过河。

mean_cn: v.埋怨；发牢骚；咕哝n.怨言；满腹牢骚
sentence: The old man grumbles about his problems.
sentence_tra: 老人对他的问题满腹牢骚。

mean_cn: adv.暂时地，临时地
sentence: Our furniture's just here temporarily while we paint our house.
sentence_tra: 我们的家具只是在我们刷漆期间临时使用的。

mean_cn: v. 接触；联系n. 接触；联系
sentence: Please contact me by phone or email.
sentence_tra: 请通过电话或电子邮件与我联系。

mean_cn: adj. 坚韧的；健壮的；强硬的棘手的；困难的
sentence: He looks like a tough guy--you don't want to fight with him.
sentence_tra: 他看起来很强壮，你不会想要和他打架的。

mean_cn: n.暴力，激烈
sentence: Violence doesn't solve any problems.
sentence_tra: 暴力解决不了任何问题。

mean_cn: adj.内疚的；有罪的
sentence: Ok, we're guilty - just please don't kill us!
sentence_tra: 好吧，我们有罪。请不要杀我们。

mean_cn: n.行为,举止;(机器的)特性
sentence: I will not tolerate this bad behaviour in my classroom!
sentence_tra: 我不能容忍这种不良行为在我的教室里！

mean_cn: n.良心，良知
sentence: I want to do something bad, but my conscience tells me not to.
sentence_tra: 我想做些坏事，但是我的良心告诉我不能做。

mean_cn: v.粉碎，猛冲，击溃n.破碎(声)，猛撞，巨大的成功
sentence: The car smashed into the car in front of it.
sentence_tra: 这辆车猛冲撞上前面那辆车。

mean_cn: n.笔记，便条，注释；纸币v.注意，记录
sentence: I use this notebook for my university lecture notes and to note down story ideas.
sentence_tra: 我用这个笔记本在大学讲座上做笔记，还会记下写故事的想法。

sentence: He missed the target on every try.
sentence_tra: 他每一发都脱靶。

mean_cn: n. 弹性织物;  松紧带;  橡皮圈;  adj. 弹性的;  可伸缩的;
sentence: I want my limbs to be elastic, just like Luffy!
sentence_tra: 我希望我的四肢可以任意伸缩，就像路飞一样！

mean_cn: v.打扰；妨碍；使烦恼
sentence: His snoring really disturbs me at night!
sentence_tra: 在晚上他的呼噜声真的很打扰我！

sentence: My utility vest is useful at work because it can hold all of my tools.
sentence_tra: 我的实用背心在工作时很有用，因为它能装很多工具。

mean_cn: n: 缺席, 外出期, 缺乏, 心不在焉;
sentence: What is the reason for everyone's absence?
sentence_tra: 为什么今天所有人都缺席？

mean_cn: n. 令人不快的事物;  adj. 令人讨厌的; 严重的; 恶劣的; 下流的;
sentence: Her brother is so nasty to her--he's always fighting and pulling her hair.
sentence_tra: 她弟弟总是和她打架，拉扯她的头发，很令人讨厌。

mean_cn: v.咬，叮，螫；剌穿
sentence: I took a big bite out of my sandwich.
sentence_tra: 我猛咬了一大口三明治。

mean_cn: n.帐篷
sentence: The circus show was inside a big tent.
sentence_tra: 马戏表演在一个大帐篷里进行。

mean_cn: adj. 无聊的, 无趣的, 烦人的;
sentence: How can you be bored by something as interesting as ancient history?
sentence_tra: 古代历史这么有趣，你怎么会觉得无聊呢？

mean_cn: n.隐蔽住，躲避处(常用来指住处)；庇护v.遮蔽，掩护，庇护
sentence: They build shelters from ice to keep themselves warm.
sentence_tra: 他们用冰建造躲避处来抵御严寒。

mean_cn: n.比率，速度，价格v.评估，被评价
sentence: My heart was beating at a normal rate.
sentence_tra: 我的心脏以正常速率跳动着。

mean_cn: n.两栖动物；水陆两用飞机和车辆adj.两栖类的；[车辆] 水陆两用的；具有双重性格的
sentence: Frogs are one kind of amphibian.
sentence_tra: 青蛙是一种两栖动物。

mean_cn: adj.人造的，假的，非原产地的
sentence: Maybe in a hundred years there will be artificial life.
sentence_tra: 也许一百年后会有人造生命。

mean_cn: n. 视野；见解； 风景v. 看，俯瞰；视察
sentence: What an amazing view from up here!
sentence_tra: 山顶的风景太赞了！

mean_cn: v.出现，浮现，冒出
sentence: The plant emerges from out of the road surface.
sentence_tra: 植物从路表破土而出。

mean_cn: n. 讨厌的人(或东西);  害虫;
sentence: Pests are those irritating and harmful insects.
sentence_tra: 害虫就是那些讨厌又有害的昆虫。

sentence: Don't drink that poison. It will kill you.
sentence_tra: 不要喝那瓶毒药，它会置你于死地。

mean_cn: adv.很少，难得
sentence: Golden coffee beans are rarely found.
sentence_tra: 金色的咖啡豆很少被人发现。

mean_cn: vi. 冬眠, 蛰居;
sentence: Bears can sleep for months when they hibernate during the winter.
sentence_tra: 冬天熊会冬眠数月。

mean_cn: adj. 防弹的, 枪弹不入的;  vt. 使能防弹;
sentence: This vehicle's thick steel is bulletproof.
sentence_tra: 这辆车厚厚的钢板是防弹的。

mean_cn: adv. 连续不断地
sentence: Sand falls continuously in an hourglass, just like time itself.
sentence_tra: 在沙漏中，沙子连续不断地漏下，就像时间本身一样。

mean_cn: n. 脉搏;  脉冲;  脉动;  vi. 跳动;  搏动;  vt. 使跳动;  有节奏地驱动;
sentence: My pulse is too fast--I need to slow down for a bit.
sentence_tra: 我的脉搏跳得太快了，我需要慢下来一点儿。

mean_cn: adv.颠倒, 混乱
sentence: Why are you sitting on the couch upside down?
sentence_tra: 为什么你颠倒着坐在沙发上？

mean_cn: v.对待；治疗；讨论；请客n.请客
sentence: I went to the dentist's office to get my teeth treated.
sentence_tra: 我去牙医那里治疗我的牙齿。

mean_cn: n.人；生物；动物
sentence: Is your favorite creature the dog, cat, or rabbit?
sentence_tra: 你最喜欢的动物是狗，猫还是兔子？

mean_cn: n. 混乱;  不端行为;  动乱;  vt. 使混乱;  使紊乱;
sentence: She can't find the skirt because of the disorder of her room.
sentence_tra: 因为房间杂乱无章，她找不到裙子了。

mean_cn: v. 搅拌
sentence: I let my kids stir the batter for me.
sentence_tra: 我让孩子帮我搅拌面糊。

mean_cn: vi. 活下来, 幸存;  vt. 比…活得长;  幸免于;
sentence: It's hard for plants to survive in the desert.
sentence_tra: 对植物来说，在沙漠里幸存很困难。

mean_cn: vi. 发生;  出现;
sentence: Car accidents can occur very quickly.
sentence_tra: 车祸会发生在一瞬间。
